title: Yasuo's wind wall should be renamed and rerendered as what it is, a wind cube
body:
Love watching my spells flying parallel to an immobile wind wall cease to exists because its actually has about 300 units of thickness, most of which is not visually apparant. And fyi, that is why spells disappear when he point blank casts it, not because he's that good, but because that 150 units of wall in front of the actual wall apparates instantly over the oncoming spells hitbox.

Feel free to not change the absurd thickness of the barrier. However I require it to meet the same standard of visibility as any other hitbox in the game.

replies.body: Most things about Yasuo are cheating
thats why you play velkoz, syndra or kassadin if you want a mage vs him, no matter how good he is that windwall wont do shit

> [{quoted}](name=Wolvahulk,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RAZnAtTM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-25T09:28:48.027+0000)
>
> thats why you play velkoz, syndra or kassadin if you want a mage vs him, no matter how good he is that windwall wont do shit

He can actually block a few of their abilities and he does rather well against Syndra
The abilities he can block are still pathetically easy to get around or are virtually irrelevant against Yasuo anyways.

ranged autos, any non instantaneous, ground targeting, or extreme z-axis skill shot.

I'd like to see you "get around" an auto or a pointblank skillshot.
There's two ranged autos in that list of champions, and only one of them is stopped by his W. And the ground-targeted abilities ignore his W too...?

I was listing the abilities windwall can block, and saying that getting around them without wall is not as easy as you said it was. You forgot to read "non" i guess. Also, any velkoz abilities you get hit with are not irrelevant, as they stack his passive+q slow that makes his other, non-blockable abilities easier to hit. Also, getting stunned by syndra is pretty significant, cause you'll prob die if she has ult up.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RAZnAtTM,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-04-25T14:44:48.323+0000)
>
> The abilities he can block are still pathetically easy to get around or are virtually irrelevant against Yasuo anyways.

Ok buddy

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RAZnAtTM,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-04-25T14:44:48.323+0000)
>
> The abilities he can block are still pathetically easy to get around or are virtually irrelevant against Yasuo anyways.

not really? vel's q, kas q, and syndra's.....everything but q? those seem important to me

Vel's Q can be angled around Yasuo's W and is much lower cooldown than it anyways. Bait it out.

Kass's Q is just kinda weak poke against Yas since the shield it grants isn't really relevant, since Yasuo is all physical damage, and Yasuo has no channels to interrupt.

Syndra's E and R are pretty fast, and basically impossible to fully block at most tiers due to ping. And if Yasuo has to W her W he opens himself up too much anyways.

I now want to do this....

? 
{{champion:161}} hi yes, I’m immobile, 3 of my 4 abilities are projectiles, and my fourth ability only deals significant damage if I tag you with the other 3
That’s why you build Crit’Koz - his autos aren’t projectiles!

> [{quoted}](name=jocomotion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RAZnAtTM,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-04-26T00:02:46.623+0000)
>
> ? 
> {{champion:161}} hi yes, I’m immobile, 3 of my 4 abilities are projectiles, and my fourth ability only deals significant damage if I tag you with the other 3

um well, his ult cant be blocked by wind wall, his knockup also doenst get blocked, you can use the 2nd part of his Q to avoid the windwall, and it has a lower base CD, and his little rift earth laser also doesnt get blocked, and he has a ton of range so that immobile bs doesnt matter, I mean lux is also immobile and somehow I have no problem killing him as a supporting lux even in a 1 v 1 if he isnt fed af.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolvahulk,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RAZnAtTM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-25T09:28:48.027+0000)
>
> thats why you play velkoz, syndra or kassadin if you want a mage vs him, no matter how good he is that windwall wont do shit

Meh, I think Morgana is best against Yasuo.  Well, best among the champions I play regularly anyway.
more like a wind rectangular prism, but eh, I'll give it to ya.

https://na.op.gg/champion/yasuo/statistics/mid

By NA.OP.GG he's ranked 42nd for win rate mid

By Champion.GG he's ranked 40th for win rate mid

He's also ranked almost dead last for average number of deaths per game

What's funny is he is still one of the most banned champs because people, such as yourself, just hate playing against him. Even though statistically, he really is pretty damn bad. And if you ask any Yasuo player they will tell you, you straight up explode with how squishy you are while being melee. 

Windwall is really his only chance to live at all.
I mean, if anything, it's a rectangular prism.
You know that walls have thickness too and are not 2-dimensional entities do you?
Yasou's windwall is like most fighter and tank champions that have at least a 20% larger hit box than their model.

What a shocker.. he doesn't counter melee champions?

Well... atleast he doesn't counter all the champions in the game

meanwhile mage mains:

"gasp some melee can actually threat us? riot nerf please, mages should be untouchable by melees"
Cube? Rectangular prism? It's a wall with a (non-zero) thickness. I'm sure you can find some examples of walls with thickness around your own home.
